Title: SharePoint Holiday Loader: A tool to load holidays easily into SharePoint
Description: SharePoint Holiday Loader allows you to quickly import public holidays into a SharePoint calendar from the standard .HOL format.
HomeWiki:
Welcome to SharePoint Holiday Loader Project...!

 

This site will be updated with latest downloads, but if you want to leave issues, have a discussion, get help or get the source that is where you should go.

Project Description
SharePoint Holiday Loader allows you to quickly import public holidays into a SharePoint calendar from the standard .HOL format.



Developed By
Robert MacLean
